title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node.js and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, offering fluent builders and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompts library and conversation management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion via Ollama models.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Simple React chat interface for Ollama with Docker deployment option.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on that runs Ollama server inside your home automation setup.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-driven catalog of custom Modelfiles and quantized models for Ollama.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-ts
summary: Lightweight TypeScript client for Ollama published on npm with zero dependencies.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that connects to Ollama, featuring conversation branching and export.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose examples for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate for Ollama using reqwest and serde.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with streaming and cancellation tokens.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama models as chat endpoints with admin UI for model selection.
